session_timeout_message.value: You have been inactive for too long and have been logged out. Please log back in to continue.

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.value:
Step completion is unavailable because either:

  1. None of your students have run the project; or
  2. This is a legacy run that was started before WISE enabled step progress monitoring
classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.description: Tooltip text to show when step completion percentage is not available for a step that can't be graded in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.value:
Step completion is unavailable because either:

  1. None of your students have run the project; or
  2. This is a legacy run that was started before WISE enabled step progress monitoring
You can still view student work by selecting the step title.
classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.description: Tooltip text to show when step completion percentage is not available for a step that can be graded in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_viewStepWo.description: Title text to show on links to view step work in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_tableInfoText.description: Text for the information display at the bottom of classroom monitor tables ({0} will be replaced with number of items currently being shown)

classroomMonitor_grading_noResponse.value: Team has not submitted any work for this step.

classroomMonitor_grading_flagOnly.description: Text for option to only display flagged items in grading views of classroom monitor
